entry.title: wertarbyte/hetzner-rdns
entry.summary: update reverse DNS settings for systems hosted at Hetzner; a successor (hetzner-robot-perl) is in preparation to utilise the webservice interface

entry.title: yappo/p5-Module-Setup
entry.summary:
This is Perl module Module::Setup.

INSTALLATION

Module::Setup installation is straightforward. If your CPAN shell is set up, you should just be able to do

% cpan Module::Setup

Download it, unpack it, then build it as per the usual:

% perl Makefile.PL
% make && make test

Then install it:

% make install

DOCUMENTATION

Module::Setup documentation is available as in POD. So you can do:

% perldoc Module::Setup

to read the documentation online with your favorite pager.

Kazuhiro Osawa
